bug.author: ggezer
bug.summary: TTL buckets are not updated upon removal of an inode
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0+ Describe the bug TTL buckets are not updated upon removal of an inode. This leaves stale entries in TTL buckets until they are purged by the TTL checker. Expected behavior TTL buckets should be kept in sync with inode tree state. Additional context In a high churn-rate workload where files are created and deleted, failure to find these stale entries dominate master logs after a fail-over.
